article_title: Richmond Times-Dispatch: Local News For Richmond And Central Virginia
article_text:

og.description: Federal prosecutors are seeking a five-year prison term for a Fredericksburg businessman with a Richmond-area store who offered one-stop shopping to cigarette traffickers, handling more than $13 million in business in just 15 months.
og.title: Major player in cigarette trafficking to be sentenced Tuesday

article_metadata.description: Federal prosecutors are seeking a five-year prison term for a Fredericksburg businessman with a Richmond-area store who offered one-stop shopping to cigarette traffickers, handling more than $13 million in business in just 15 months.
